overview: George Babu is responsible for Finance & Corporate Development at Rypple. Prior to joining Rypple, George spent the last several years working on a variety of technology and intellectual property-related projects with both Research in Motion (RIM) and Bereskin & Parr, one of Canada’s leading IP law firms. George holds B.A.Sc degree in Electrical Engineering and a JD and MBA degree, all at the University of Toronto.
